This game is trash.  

I'm updating this to tell you my experience from the developer and the community. 
- It's a toxic community filled with truly troubled people. 
- Developers don't care to balance characters/perks.
- Developers want you to pay for SPECIAL additional characters/killers/skins/PERKS every month.
- License only skins you cannot properly fashion mix/matching. 

While I've played it a lot, it feels like none of my complaints every go through.  People are breaking the game.  Rebuild the community before you put out anymore content please?

外挂甚多 匹配机制更傻逼 游戏玩家素质更差 我刚玩没两天 玩两局凛妹 把把碰见4红段开黑车 要么就是被挂了就拔线 
昨晚呢 碰见几个所谓 第五人格人皇的憨批 被我杀了出去就开喷 说什么什么这游戏屠夫素质真差  守尸？
我在想 那所谓的第五人格_学龄前游戏玩不就是图一乐？挂着恐怖游戏的标签搁着吓baby呢？国内整改三次的恐怖 悬疑 合作类游戏 我国内过家家游戏恐怖怎么了~ 
笑死我了 还人皇呢 见面放板快窗被抓 上勾挣扎空格不停歇 拔线喷人一气呵成      还骂守尸呢 我踹个板子踢个电机你就开始二挂了 ~
建议这种nt车队多来一些 我没杀过瘾呢

很好的一款游戏，和好友开黑玩有很多乐趣。不过对刚入手的新手来说可能不太友好，匹配系统比较随意，玩屠夫可能会碰到高段位的人类；新手没有血点升级血网等级，也就是技能比较少；好心态很重要。建议想入坑的玩家可以去搜搜相关的DBD游戏视频，有一定了解再入，只要有耐心玩下去，相信杀机不会让你失望！

Small complaint about the PC Port / Spanish and EnglishI tried several times to like this game but I did not succeed, 4 years ago it came out and they still do not fix the problems that the PC version has, forced borderless window fullscreen, forced vsync (deactivating it through the game files does not work, since when running on borderless windows, windows 10 activates its own vsync so you still have input lag anyway), no video options (only high medium low), can't change the resolution, bugs everywhere, it happened to me 15 times I approach a stone and get stuck with the ground (fixed in the last patch), since the game is in borderless window and not fullscreen when you need to click to fix an engine or rescue a partner, you are clicking the windows desktop, not the game, so it does not register any action (if you want to avoid that use gamepad), I died like 10 times because of the windows I don't know why but when you jump over them and get away from them the murderer can still hit you, I don't know if it's a ping or hitbox problem, I got tired, I'll only play it for my friends, but I don't enjoy it, I won't change the review until they fix these problemsEdit: The anticheat already kick me from 5 games, telling me that some file got broken and the game insta-close, and sometimes trying to open the game the anticheat don't open it because for some random reasons 4 files got broken, and then i have to verify the files for a 3 GB download for 4 bad files.Edit2: Since the last update it does not stop kicking me from the groups of my friends saying that there was a connection problem. Edit3: the game keeps broken the files and make it quit from the games and the menu, i can't play anymore, have to verify the files to fix it.Edit4: okay, im done im uninstalling the game, i dont want to play this anymore, if was for me il get it out of my library to never see it again, i got hit through a pallet because the hitbox and lag compensation is awful, bye DBD i wish i never buy you. Pequeña queja sobre el Port de PC / Español e Inglesintenté varias veces que este juego me guste pero no lo logré, hace 4 años que salio y aun no arreglan los problemas que tiene la version de PC, el juego se ejecuta en ventana completa sin bordes de manera forzada, vsync forzado (desactivarlo a travez de los archivos del juego no sirve, ya que al ejecutarse en ventana completa sin bordes, windows 10 activa su propio vsync asi que sigues con input lag de todas maneras), sin opciones de video (solo alto medio bajo), no se puede cambiar la resolucion, bugs por todas partes, me pasó 15 veces que me acerco a una piedra y quedo bugeado con el piso (arreglado en el ultimo parche), ya que el juego está en ventana completa y no pantalla completa cuando necesitas hacer click para arreglar un motor o rescatar a un compañero, estas clickeando el escritorio de windows, no el juego, asi que no registra ninguna accion (si quieren evitar eso usen gamepad), me morí como 10 veces por culpa de las ventanas que no se por que pero al saltarlas y alejarte de ellas el asesino aun puede pegarte, no se si es un problema de ping o de hitbox, me cansé, solo lo jugaré por mis amigos, pero no lo disfruto, no cambiaré la review hasta que arreglen estos problemasEdit: El anticheat ya me kickeó de 5 partidas, diciendome que algun archivo se rompió y el juego se cierra instantaneamente, algunas veces al intentar abrir el juego el anticheat no me permite abrir el juego por la misma razon, archivos rotos, al verificarlos encuentra 4 archivos rotos y debo hacer una descarga de 3 GB.Edit2: desde la ultima update no para de kickearme de los grupos de mis amigos diciendo que hubo un problema de conexion. Edit3:el juego sigue rompiendo los archivos, en la ultima update tuve que verificar cache ya que el juego se me cerraba diciendo que los archivos estaban rotos, cerrandose en el menu, en el juego, no podia jugar. Edit4: Listo me cansé, lo voy a desinstalar, no lo quiero jugar mas, si fuera por mi lo sacaria de mi libreria para no verlo nunca mas, me golpearon a travez de un palet, el hitbox es una porqueria y jugar con otras personas que tiene ping es aun peor, si te toca un asesino con ping, salí de la partida la vas a pasar muy mal, adios DBD ojala no te hubiera comprado nunca.

dead by daylight è un gioco fatto per appassionati del genere horror,consigliato per giocarlo con gli amici.
il gioco di base costa poco consiglio di aspettare gli sconti per acquistare i dlc .
questo gioco ti fa diventate molto competitivo con il tempo se sai giocare le partite sono molto bravo da sopravvissuto che da killer . all'inizio io non sapevo giocare  , ma poi io ho cominciato a prendere fiducia passate un paio di settimane ho deciso di essere competitivo e fino ad oggi sono bravo. in conclusione il gioco a solo due difetti il primo sono i bag che rovinano un po l'esperienza di gioco in oltre dopo un po i bug venivano corretti ma spesso peggioravano.
e l'altro difetto è avere una connessione stabile e decente che purtroppo la mia connessione fa schifo. pero lo consiglio molto.
O jogo contem bugs demais desde o seu lançamento. Com gameplays repetitivas e uma comunidade bastante toxica, torna-se inviavel jogar o game e não permite diversão alguma. Recomendo, adoro esse jogo.

Fun to play, especially with friends. Game has been somewhat buggy lately, but I'm hoping a patch/update will fix that. Loading times for matches are somewhat long. That may be because more people want to play as a survivor instead of a killer. 

One major negative that I've experience while playing is how buffed the killer characters are. As a survivor, it really comes down to being able to hide well or have decent teammates because killers are faster, have waaay better perks, and many of them like to camp or find other ways to make the game less fun. While not every game will be bad, you'll certainly know when you're in a bad match.

Good Game

This game was really fun once. The match making was really annoying but overall a bearable and fun experience. So you might ask why am I giving this a negative review. The answer is unfortunately something that should've been a positive but after seeing it in action, I've come to realize that it has greatly harmed the community. I am of course talking about cross platform play. Here is a list of things that has happened to literally myself and every single one of my friends (there's 50 of us) since the cross platform update.

1. Killer constantly camps harder than I've ever seen a PC player do and I've been playing this game since its release. 

2. Killer constantly tunnels the entire game, just to camp them when they finally have their target downed. They will even go as far as looking for that specific person even if they lose them.

3. Killer is easily juked.

4. Survivors body blocking survivors.

5. Survivors exposing players they know are in a locker to the killer.

6. Unhooking survivors when the killer is 2 meters away. (acting like they'll maintain social distance)

7. Survivors disconnecting as soon as the killer finds them or puts them in the dying state.

8. Killer disconnecting as soon as there are 2 generators left and no one's been hooked.

9. Players running and vaulting fast thus alerting the killer.



This has been happening almost every single game ever since the update. It's to the point where we can predict without even seeing the symbol above their names who is playing on console and who is playing on PC. The best way to describe how it feels is like playing with a bunch of children who are too young to play this game, which knowing consoles, this may very well be the case.

I have nothing against console players and was originally super hyped about this update but ever since it's dropped, it has been a horrible gaming experience. It's so rare for me to even get out of a game alive now because I'm too busy trying to save the other survivors(who are console players) and I end up dying myself. I'm a rank 3 survivor and have been stuck at rank 9 since the update. It's horrible.

I honestly think that this update should be revoked and they should keep the platforms separate. Hopefully they do something to fix this.


EDIT

You can turn off crossplay. This is strongly recommended!!!

This game is a must have for any fans of online horror games. It's a bit on the expensive side but if you enjoy this type of game I would 100% recommend. It's really fun to play with friends and is just an amazing game all around with interesting maps, lots of different options for skins, exciting gameplay and much more. I never really get bored of this game, it's just such a great game, probably one of my favourites. Hope this review helped anyone considering buying this game!
